Ipe is a drawing editor for creating figures in PDF format.  It
supports making small figures for inclusion into LaTeX-documents as
well as making multi-page PDF presentations.

Entry of text as LaTeX source code. This makes it easy to

  the main document.  In the display text is displayed as it will
  appear in the figure.

Ipe extensible drawing editor is a free vector graphics editor for creating figures in PDF or EPS format. It can be used for making small figures for inclusion into LaTeX documents as well as making multi-page PDF presentations.

Many of the kernel security vulnerabilities reported are information leaks
- passing the contents of uninitialized memory back to user space.  These
leaks are not normally seen to be severe problems, but the potential for
trouble always exists.  An attacker may be able to find a sequence of
operations which puts useful information (a cryptographic key, perhaps)
into a place where the kernel will leak it.  So information leaks should be
avoided, a...

Hi Gabor,

I am the original author of GNU grep.  I am also a FreeBSD user,
although I live on -stable (and older) and rarely pay attention
to -current.

However, while searching the -current mailing list for an unrelated
reason, I stumbled across some flamage regarding BSD grep vs GNU grep
performance....

links.title: GNU/Linux naming controversy - Wikipedia
links.description: The GNU/Linux naming controversy is a dispute between members of the free software community and open-source software community over whether to refer to computer operating systems that use a combination of GNU software and the Linux kernel as "GNU/Linux" or "Linux".[1]

What is MINIX? The most popular OS in the world, thanks to Intel
links.description: You might not know it, but inside your Intel system, you have an operating system running in addition to your main OS that is raising eyebrows and concerns. It's called MINNIX.

links.title: www:documentation:reliability [Wiki]
links.description: One of the main goals of MINIX 3 is reliability. Below we discuss some of the more important principles that enhance MINIX 3's reliability. These principles also enhance security, since most security flaws are due to attackers exploiting bugs in the code, so greater reliability will also improve security. Some of the ideas discussed are in the current release, but a few are scheduled for the next release. As this is a research project, we often ...

links.title: My Billion Dollar Mistake
links.description: At my last company, KISSmetrics, I made a mistake that I truly believe lost me a billion dollar opportunity. It’s not something I’m proud of, and it’s one of the main reasons I’m now obsessed with building products the right way. I wrote the painful details of exactly what happened so you don’t have to make the same mistakes I did.
links.original_title: My Billion Dollar Mistake

links.title: Online Analytics Firm Settles Suit Over Unstoppable User Tracking
links.description: KISSmetrics, an online analytics company, agreed to pay more than $500,000 to lawyers to settle accusations that its sneaky tracking technologies violated hacking laws. The two users who sued get $5,000.

links.title: Null References: The Billion Dollar Mistake
links.description: Tony Hoare introduced Null references in ALGOL W back in 1965 "simply because it was so easy to implement", says Mr. Hoare. He talks about that decision considering it "my billion-dollar mistake".

links.title: Ochlocracy - Wikipedia
links.description: Ochlocracy (Greek: ὀχλοκρατία, translit. okhlokratía;  Latin: ochlocratia) or mob rule is the rule of government by mob or a mass of people, or, the intimidation of legitimate authorities. As a pejorative for majoritarianism, it is akin to the Latin phrase: mobile vulgus meaning "the fickle crowd", from which the English term "mob" originally was derived in the 1680s.

links.description: 1. Patrick Bergemann, Judge Thy Neighbor: Denunciations in the Spanish Inquisition, Romanov Russia, and Nazi Germany.  A very specific, useful, and interesting account of actual denunciation practices during the above-mentioned episodes.  During the Inquisition, there was general immunity given to most denouncers, you can imagine the resulting incentives.  This book is becoming more relevant than …

links.title: Fundamental theorem of arithmetic - Wikipedia
links.description: In number theory, the fundamental theorem of arithmetic, also called the unique factorization theorem or the unique-prime-factorization theorem, states that every integer greater than 1[3] either is a prime number itself or can be represented as the product of prime numbers and that, moreover, this representation is unique, up to (except for) the order of the factors.[4][5][6] For example,
